page.title: 19THREE CRAFTSMEN
page.content: The survey area has three noted craftsmen living within it:-{a } {sculptor, an illustrator and a glass {blower.}The sculptor originally came from East Anglia but he has been living here for 18 years. He has taught all over the country. He has made lots of models. He makes them from different materials like{plaster, {wood and junk.}It takes 8 people to lift one of his models. He uses ordinary tools to make them. The model that he is making now will take him until 1988 and will be 60 by 30 feet. It will be in Bristol at an exhibition in 3 years time. The illustrator and his family live almost as recluses in a{remote valley below Polcrebo Downs. Their house was built in the{17th century.}They had intentions of restoring it so it would look the same as it did then.
